General.Name: Advanced International Multitech Co Ltd
General.Description: Advanced International Multitech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and sale of golf equipment, golf ball, composites, and bicycle parts in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers golf products, including metal woods, irons/wedges, putters, graphite shafts, and club assemblies; carbon fiber bicycle components, such as frames, forks, and parts; golf balls; thermoset and thermoplastic composites; investment casting services for components of aircraft interior, bike, industrial, and hardware in titanium and stainless steel; and CFRP wheels. It also offers plastic products, as well as engaged in international trade. Advanced International Multitech Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Hsiao-Fen  Tu
